title: Welcome to the Blog
content:
This is your first blog post. You can edit or delete it to get started.

Getting Started

  1. Sign in with your admin account
  2. Navigate to the blog section
  3. Start creating content!
summary: Getting started with your new blog

title: An Earlier Post
content:
This is an older post to demonstrate the recent posts feature.

When you have multiple posts, the blog will show them in chronological order with the most recent first.
summary: A sample older post for testing
